Cardiologist warned men about the reasons for a sudden cardiac arrest.Today is 21:00.0
Sardo-Sudent Diseases are the leading cause of death worldwide, with men between 30 and 50 years of age dying more often than women of the same age, warning Irina Permikin, a medical doctor, to speak with Lenta.ru.

" In general, cardiac arrests of men over 40 years of age are due to an undiagnosed heart disease that occurs as a result of cholesterol accumulation and atherosclerotic educationFucking specs
Alecandre Matrosov's Patriotic Action is launched in the Great Lukas (0+)Today is 8:00.0
The Aleksandr Matrosov ' s Patriotic Action is launched in the Great Lukas in honour of the 100th anniversary of the Union of SovietsAlexandra Matveyev♪ The Cultural Committee of the City Administration calls upon the giants to take pictures of the hero of the Soviet Union in the social avatarsgrids
The great athletes took the prizes for regional competitions.Today is 7:00.0
From 27 to 28 January, the Pscove Championship and the Pskov Region Aerobics Object were held. The contests were attended by giant athletes.

In the category " 15-17 years " , the " gold " individual statements took placeAnna Bobi♪ In the name of the Troika, the bronze award was removedIvanov Veronica, Dawado Darya, Nikitina Elizabeth♪ " silver " in the " group " nominationsCircumstances
In the Great Luka, a 23-year-old giant robbed a sports inventory store.Today is 18:00.0
On 26 January, a 1976 male born to the police. He told me that the early morning of 26 January, an unidentified man broke the glass and entered the sports equipment store on Diaconov Street. An evil man has taken out the store clocks, knives and electroshockers.

The guards have identified the burglar. They were previously tried for 23 years.Circumstances
The Director of the Grauluk School addressed the All-Russian Seminar.It's 17:30.0
Director of School No. 6Natalia Lubavinaaddressed the All-Russian Seminar " The Education Branch: Challenges, Trends,prospects
The graduator was assigned an honorary title.Today is 5:00.0
Head of the Foreign Languages Department of the Great Academy of Physical Culture and SportsNatalie ErshovaAppropriation of the title " Honorary worker in education of the Russian Federation " .

This rank is awarded for merit and good faith.labour
Grandegradnan is fined for the discreditation of the Armed Forces of the Russian FederationIt's 16:30.0
A 23-year-old local citizen was administratively responsible for public actions aimed at discrediting the Russian Armed ForcesFederation Circular
The police detained a 28-year-old giant who was a courier for fraudsters.Today is 4:00.0
A 85-year-old Pecor, as well as two retirees from the Red Cross village of 1933 and 1936, were referred to the Pskov police. The complainants were the victims of telephone aspherists operating under the " Your relative was hit by an accident " scheme. Confusedolder persons
In the great Lukas, a man has made a dear cognac from the store.Today is 3:00.0
On 29 January, a bottle of cognac valued at 3,500 roubles was stolen by an unidentified man from a store on a prospect of Oktyabrsky. A representative of the store called the police.

He committed the crime of a 1976 male born. It turns out the giant's been tried and not working.
The Deputo deputa Alexandre Borisov congratulated the inhabitants of the Kunyin district on a commemorative date.Today is 14:30.0
Head of the Regional Office of the Russian Military Historical SocietyAlexander Borisov:

" Today we celebrate the 82nd anniversary of the liberation of my homeland from the German-Fashist invaders. 31 January 1942 - Day that will remain foreverhistory
No more news,Go back upstairs?

Sardo-Sudent Diseases are the leading cause of death worldwide, with men between 30 and 50 years of age dying more often than women of the same age, warning Irina Permikin, a medical doctor, to speak with Lenta.ru.

" In general, cardiac arrests of males over 40 years of age are due to an undiagnosed heart disease, which arises from the accumulation of cholesterol and the formation of atherosclerotic drums.
